trans: n. 平台；月台，站台；坛；讲台

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

sentences.english: a small raised platform at one end of the room
sentences.chinese: 房间一端凸起的小讲台

sentences.english: an oil exploration platform
sentences.chinese: 石油勘探平台

detailed_translations.english: the raised place beside a railway track where you get on and off a train in a station

name: vehicle
trans: n. [车辆] 车辆；工具；交通工具；运载工具；传播媒介；媒介物

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

name: bison
trans: n. 北美野牛；欧洲野牛 n. (Bison)人名；(法、德)比松

sentences.english: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.chinese: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

sentences.english: But the biggest obstacle is the ranchers themselves, whose cattle compete with prairie dogs and bison for grass and space.
sentences.chinese: 但最大的阻碍来自牧场主本身，他们的牲畜与土拨鼠和野牛们竞争着草场和空间。

sentences.english: Watching bison up close is mesmerizing, like watching a grass fire about to leap out of control.
sentences.chinese: 近距离观察野牛会使人生疑，就像看到一场失控的大火即将恣肆于草原。

detailed_translations.english: an animal like a large cow, with hair on its head and shoulders

name: exist
trans: vi. 存在；生存；生活；继续存在

sentences.english: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.english: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.chinese: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

detailed_translations.english: to be present in a place or situation

name: extinct
trans: adj. 灭绝的，绝种的；熄灭的 vt. 使熄灭

sentences.english: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 恐龙已灭绝数千万年了。

sentences.english: Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫在野生环境中可能会绝种。

sentences.english: an extinct species
sentences.chinese: 已灭绝的一个物种

detailed_translations.english: (of a type of plant, animal, etc.) no longer in existence

name: hide
trans: vt. 隐藏；隐瞒；鞭打 vi. 隐藏 n. 躲藏；兽皮；躲藏处

sentences.english: She keeps a bottle of gin hidden behind a stack of books.
sentences.chinese: 她在一堆书的后面藏了一瓶杜松子酒。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately put or keep something or someone in a place where they cannot easily be seen or found

name: roam
trans: vi. 漫游，漫步；流浪 vt. 在…漫步，漫游；在…流浪 n. 漫步，漫游；流浪

sentences.english: Chickens and geese roam freely in the back yard.
sentences.chinese: 鸡和鹅在后院随意溜达。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t let your children roam the streets .
sentences.chinese: 你不应该让孩子在街上游荡。

detailed_translations.english: to walk or travel, usually for a long time, with no clear purpose or direction

name: shelter
trans: n. 庇护；避难所；遮盖物 vt. 保护；使掩蔽 vi. 躲避，避难 n. (Shelter)人名；(英)谢尔特

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.chinese: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
If a place or thing is sheltered by something, it is protected by that thing from wind and rain

name: biting
trans: adj. 刺痛的；辛辣的 v. 咬；抓住；刺进；欺骗（bite的ing形式）

name: blizzard
trans: n. 暴风雪，大风雪；大打击 vi. 下暴风雪 n. (Blizzard)人名；(英)布利泽德

sentences.english: We got stuck in a blizzard.
sentences.chinese: 我们被暴风雪困住了。

detailed_translations.english: a severe snowstorm

name: dangerous
trans: adj. 危险的 危险地

sentences.english: laws about dangerous dogs
sentences.chinese: 有关危险犬类的法律

sentences.english: Some of these prisoners are extremely dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.english: The powdered milk was not as good as breast milk, and was downright dangerous (= actually dangerous ) when it was mixed with unclean water.
sentences.chinese: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

detailed_translations.english: able or likely to harm or kill you

name: hurricane
trans: n. 飓风，暴风

sentences.english: I still remember a hurricane that hit us thirty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得三十年前袭击我们的一次飓风。

sentences.english: Our love is not fierce, not hot, but despite the tsunami hurricane, also vowed.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱，不剧烈，不炙热，可是任凭海啸飓风，也矢志不渝。

sentences.english: If an earthquake, hurricane, winter storm, or other disaster strikes your community, you might not have access to food , water, and electricity for days or even weeks.
sentences.chinese: 如果有地震、飓风、暴风雪或其他的灾害突袭你的家园，你可能会好几天甚至好几个星期都得不到食物、水和电。

detailed_translations.english: a storm that has very strong fast winds and that moves over water

name: whiteout
trans: n. 临时性失明（因暴露于恶劣环境而引起的）；乳白天空（极地的一种大气光象）

name: boot
trans: n. 靴子；踢；汽车行李箱；解雇；车轮夹锁；再者 v. 踢；启动；在车轮上装制动装置；解雇；（使）穿靴；锁住（非法停车的轮子） n. (Boot) （美、英、荷、加、德、意、俄）布特（人名）

sentences.english: hiking boots
sentences.chinese: 远足靴

sentences.english: a pair of boots
sentences.chinese: 一双靴子

detailed_translations.english: a type of shoe that covers your whole foot and the lower part of your leg

name: chimney
trans: n. 烟囱

sentences.english: We can’t light a fire because the chimney hasn’t been swept.
sentences.chinese: 烟囱管没有清扫过，我们生不了火。

sentences.english: a factory chimney
sentences.chinese: 工厂的烟囱

detailed_translations.english: a structure through which smoke or steam is carried up away from a fire, etc. and through the roof of a building; the part of this that is above the roof

name: fur
trans: n. 皮，皮子；毛皮；软毛 n. 水垢 vt. 用毛皮覆盖；使穿毛皮服装 n. (Fur)人名；(法)菲尔；(瑞典)富尔

sentences.english: a fur coat
sentences.chinese: 裘皮大衣

detailed_translations.english: the thick soft hair that covers the bodies of some animals, such as cats, dogs, and rabbits

detailed_translations.chinese: 用毛皮覆盖；使穿毛皮服装

name: reindeer
trans: n. [脊椎][畜牧] 驯鹿

sentences.english: ...a herd of reindeer.
sentences.chinese: …一群驯鹿。

detailed_translations.english: a large  deer  with long wide  antler s (= horns )  , that lives in cold northern areas

name: stocking
trans: n. 长筒女袜；（男式）长筒袜；（尤指用于治疗静脉病的）袜状弹性绷带：（马小腿部的）白斑；圣诞袜 (Christmas stocking) n. (Stocking) （美）斯托金（人名）

sentences.english: I want you stuffed in my stocking.
sentences.chinese: 我只要你塞在我的袜子里。

sentences.english: The Christmas stocking bulged with goodies.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节袜子里塞满了好吃的东西。

sentences.english: She ran her silk stocking on a nail last night.
sentences.chinese: 她昨天夜晚丝袜被钉子钩住，抽了丝。

detailed_translations.english: a thin close-fitting piece of clothing that covers a woman’s leg and foot

name: treat
trans: vt. 治疗；对待；探讨；视为 vi. 探讨；请客；协商 n. 请客；款待 n. (Treat)人名；(英)特里特

sentences.english: She treats me like one of the family.
sentences.chinese: 她把我当作家人看待。

sentences.english: sewage treated so that it can be used as fertilizer
sentences.chinese: 经过处理可用作肥料的污水

sentences.english: Let's go out for lunch─ my treat (= I will pay) .
sentences.chinese: 咱们到外面去吃午餐，我请客。

detailed_translations.english: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way
something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

name: celebration
trans: n. 庆典，庆祝会；庆祝；颂扬

sentences.english: the lively New Year celebrations in the city centre
sentences.chinese: 市中心热闹的新年庆祝活动

detailed_translations.english: an occasion or party when you celebrate something

name: fast
trans: adj. 快速的，迅速的；紧的，稳固的 adv. 迅速地；紧紧地；彻底地 vi. 禁食，斋戒 n. 斋戒；绝食 n. (Fast)人名；(德、英、俄、芬、捷、瑞典)法斯特

sentences.english: a fast car
sentences.chinese: 速度很快的汽车

sentences.english: That can’t be the time - my watch must be fast.
sentences.chinese: 不可能是这个时间——一定是我的表快了。

sentences.english: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.chinese: 慢点——你开得太快了。

detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move quickly
moving quickly

name: pray
trans: vt. 祈祷；恳求；央求 vi. 祈祷；请；恳求 n. (Pray)人名；(匈)普劳伊；(英)普雷

sentences.english: They went to the mosque to pray.
sentences.chinese: 他们去清真寺祷告。

detailed_translations.english: to speak to God in order to ask for help or give thanks

name: religion
trans: n. 宗教；宗教信仰

sentences.english: The U.S. Constitution promises freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 美国宪法保证宗教信仰自由。

sentences.english: a course on philosophy and religion
sentences.chinese: 关于哲学和宗教的课程

sentences.english: the Islamic religion
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰教

detailed_translations.english: a belief in one or more gods

name: carve
trans: vt. 雕刻；切开；开创 vi. 切开；做雕刻工作 n. (Carve)人名；(西、瑞典)卡韦

sentences.english: carved wooden chairs
sentences.chinese: 木雕椅子

sentences.english: Carve the meat into slices.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成片。

detailed_translations.english: to make an object or pattern by cutting a piece of wood or stone

name: column
trans: n. 纵队，列；专栏；圆柱，柱形物

sentences.english: He writes a weekly column for ‘The Times’.
sentences.chinese: 他每周为《泰晤士报》写一篇专栏文章。

detailed_translations.english: an article on a particular subject or by a particular writer that appears regularly in a newspaper or magazine

name: Maya
trans: n. （印度教、佛教）幻，魔力；幻现之力，空幻境界 n. (Maya) 玛雅人，玛雅语 adj. (Maya) （英、印、阿、俄）玛雅（人名）

name: ruin
trans: n. 毁坏；毁灭，灭亡；崩溃；破产，一无所有，丢掉工作；破产的根源，祸根；废墟；残存部分 v. 破坏，糟蹋；毁灭，对……有灾难性的影响；使破败，成为废墟；（使）破产；（诗文）头朝下跌落；堕落 n. (Ruin) （法、俄、意、瑞典）吕安（人名）

sentences.english: an interesting old ruin
sentences.chinese: 一处有意思的古老废墟

sentences.english: the ruins of a bombed-out office block
sentences.chinese: 被炸毁的办公楼的废墟

sentences.english: Jefferson was ruined by the lawsuit.
sentences.chinese: 杰弗逊因为那场官司倾家荡产。

sentences.english: This illness has ruined my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个病毁掉了我的生活。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a building that is left after the rest has been destroyed
to make someone lose all their money

name: temple
trans: n. 庙宇；寺院；神殿；太阳穴 n. (Temple)；（法）唐普勒（人名）；（英）坦普尔（人名）

sentences.english: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.chinese: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.english: The entire valley reverberated with the sound of the temple bells.
sentences.chinese: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.english: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大火过后， 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

name: well
trans: adv. 顺利地，令人满意地；熟练地，技术好地；妥善地，恰当地；赞扬地，赞许地；有益地，有利地；容易地；友善地；有充分理由，合理地；很，非常；富裕地，舒适地；完全地，充分地；大大地，远远地；（程度或标准）多少，怎样 adj. 健康的；令人满意的；明智的，可取的 n. 水井，油井，气井；楼梯井，电梯井道；（法庭中的）律师席；韦尔斯（有矿泉的地方）（Wells）；（储液体的）凹槽；（大量）来源，源泉；吧台酒架；廉价酒；（物理）势阱，电位阱 int. （用于表示想要开口说话）嗯，好；唔，嗯，哦（表示对要说的话不确定）；好吧，算了（对不愉快的事表示接受）；好啦，哎呀（用于劝说或让人不要生气、焦虑等）；嗳（表示生气或不赞成）；怎么样呢，哎（表示等待回答或行动）；好啦（用于结束活动或对话）；（停顿后继续交谈）唔，这个；（表示惊奇、愤怒或宽慰）哎呀，哟，啊；噢（用于纠正刚才说过的话） v. （液体）流出，涌出；（感情）涌上，涌起 【名】 （Well）（英、德、荷）韦尔（人名）

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

name: chore
trans: n. 家庭杂务；日常的零星事务；讨厌的或累人的工作

sentences.english: everyday chores like shopping and housework
sentences.chinese: 购物和做家务之类的日常琐事

sentences.english: We share the domestic chores.
sentences.chinese: 我们分担家务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭杂务；日常的零星事务；讨厌的或累人的工作
detailed_translations.english: a small job that you have to do regularly, especially work that you do to keep a house clean

name: pitcher
trans: n. 投手；大水罐 n. (Pitcher)人名；(英)皮彻

sentences.english: a pitcher of water
sentences.chinese: 一罐水

detailed_translations.english: the player in baseball who throws the ball

name: runt
trans: n. 小家畜；家鸽之一种；小牛 n. (Runt)人名；(捷)伦特

name: transform
trans: vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: tryouts
trans: n. 试用；选拔赛（tryout的复数）

name: ancient
trans: adj. 古代的；古老的，过时的；年老的 n. 古代人；老人

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Asia
sentences.chinese: 亚洲的古代文明

sentences.english: an ancient walled city
sentences.chinese: 有城墙的古城

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago

name: arch
trans: n. 弓形，拱形；拱门 adj. 主要的 vt. 使…弯成弓形；用拱连接 vi. 拱起；成为弓形 n. (Arch)人名；(德)阿尔希；(英)阿奇

sentences.english: When she passed under the arch leading out of the park, Mira whooped with delight.
sentences.chinese: 从通向公园外的拱门下走过时，米拉高兴地喊叫起来。

detailed_translations.english: a structure with a curved top and straight sides that supports the weight of a bridge or building
to form or make something form a curved shape

name: crane
trans: n. 吊车，起重机；鹤 vi. 伸着脖子看；迟疑，踌躇 vt. 用起重机起吊；伸长脖子 n. (Crane)人名；(意、葡)克拉内；(英、法、西)克兰

sentences.english: The little prefabricated hut was lifted away by a huge crane.
sentences.chinese: 那间小小的预制棚屋被一台巨大的起重机吊走了。

sentences.english: She craned her neck to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 她伸长脖子以便看得清楚一些。

sentences.english: Children craned to get close to him.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们伸长脖子想靠近他。

detailed_translations.english: a large tall machine used by builders for lifting heavy things
If you crane your neck or head, you stretch your neck in a particular direction in order to see or hear something better

name: defeat
trans: v. 击败；挫败（某人）；阻止达成（目的）；反对（动议或提议）；（使）无法理解；（使）无效 n. 失败；战胜

sentences.english: They hoped to defeat the enemy at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望在海上击败敌人。

sentences.english: She was a woman who hated to admit defeat.
sentences.chinese: 她是个不愿认输的女人。

detailed_translations.english: to win a victory over someone in a war, competition, game etc
failure to win or succeed

name: empire
trans: n. 帝国；帝王统治，君权 n. (Empire)人名；(法)昂皮尔

sentences.english: the Roman empire
sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国

detailed_translations.english: a group of countries that are all controlled by one ruler or government

name: gladiator
trans: n. 斗剑者；古罗马公开表演的格斗者；争论者

sentences.english: This is an arena for gladiators only, for the Titans of the track.
sentences.chinese: 这是个仅为勇士而且是仅为此行里的大力士勇士所设的竞技场。

detailed_translations.chinese: 角斗士， 与野兽搏斗者
detailed_translations.english: a soldier who fought against other men or wild animals as an entertainment in ancient Rome

name: stadium
trans: n. 体育场；露天大型运动场

sentences.english: the new Olympic Stadium
sentences.chinese: 新的奥林匹克体育场

detailed_translations.chinese: 体育场；露天大型运动场
detailed_translations.english: a building for public events, especially sports and large rock music concerts, consisting of a playing field surrounded by rows of seats

name: crocodile
trans: n. 鳄鱼

sentences.english: a crocodile briefcase
sentences.chinese: 鳄鱼皮公文包

detailed_translations.english: a large  reptile  with a long mouth and many sharp teeth that lives in lakes and rivers in hot wet parts of the world

name: endangered
trans: adj. 濒临灭绝的；有生命危险的

sentences.chinese: 她把植物周围的土壤弄湿。

trans: n. 钻石，金刚石；菱形；方块牌 adj. 菱形的；金刚钻的 n. (Diamond)人名；(英、意、葡)戴蒙德；(法)迪亚蒙

sentences.chinese: 订婚钻戒

sentences.chinese: 这名下院议员的评论引发了一场政治论战。

used or paid for a journey from one place to another and back again

sentences.chinese: 简单而可口的饭菜

sentences.chinese: 她拯救家人的英勇行为

sentences.chinese: 劳伦斯与命运的勇敢抗争

sentences.chinese: 她把他描述为英雄人物。

If you describe someone's actions or plans as heroics, you think that they are foolish or dangerous because they are too difficult or brave for the situation in which they occur

sentences.chinese: 教堂的墙边立着一排圣徒像。

name: sign
trans: n. 迹象；符号；记号；手势；指示牌 vi. 签署；签名 vt. 签署；示意

sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

sentences.chinese: 我希望他现在醒着。

sentences.chinese: 我给她端去咖啡的时候，她还是半睡半醒的样子。

sentences.chinese: 听无聊的课你是怎样不让自己睡着的？

sentences.chinese: 埃玛忧心忡忡，半宿都没睡着。

sentences.chinese: 那声音使他睡意全无。

sentences.chinese: 她醒来时已是中午。

sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.chinese: 大脑的化学性质

sentences.english: the human brain
sentences.chinese: 人脑

sentences.chinese: 她死于脑瘤。

sentences.english: The job requires brains.
sentences.chinese: 做这工作需要头脑。

name: ceiling

sentences.chinese: 天花板很高的房间

sentences.english: a light hanging from the ceiling
sentences.chinese: 吊在天花板上的灯

detailed_translations.english: the inner surface of the top part of a room

name: glide

sentences.english: Waiters glide between tightly packed tables bearing trays of pasta.
sentences.chinese: 侍者们托着一盘盘的意大利面食在拥挤的餐桌间自如穿行。

name: sleep

sentences.chinese: 我一般仰卧着睡觉。

sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.chinese: 他算是幸运的，至少还有个睡觉的地方。

sentences.english: Nearly 10% of the Earth’s surface is covered by ice.

sentences.english: Gas bubbles in any liquid tend to rise to the surface .

if someone or something surfaces, they suddenly appear somewhere, especially after being gone or hidden for a long time

sentences.english: the headquarters of the United Nations

sentences.chinese: 都柏林总部已经同意了

sentences.chinese: 在阵亡之前他奉命执行过200多次军事任务。

sentences.english: US troops taking part in the peacekeeping mission
sentences.chinese: 参与维和任务的美军

sentences.english: a British trade mission to Moscow
sentences.chinese: 派往莫斯科的英国贸易代表团

detailed_translations.english: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft

name: patrol
trans: n. 巡逻；巡逻队；侦察队 vt. 巡逻；巡查 vi. 巡逻；巡查

sentences.english: The security forces increased their patrols in the area.
sentences.chinese: 安全部队加强了对该地区的巡逻。

detailed_translations.english: when someone goes around different parts of an area at regular times to check that there is no trouble or danger
to go around the different parts of an area or building at regular times to check that there is no trouble or danger

name: sidekick

name: superhero
trans: n. 超级英雄

sentences.english: ...superheroes like Batman and Superman.
sentences.chinese: ...像蝙蝠侠和超人那样的超级英雄。

detailed_translations.english: a character in stories who uses special powers, such as great strength or the ability to fly, to help people

name: suspicious
trans: adj. 可疑的；怀疑的；多疑的

sentences.english: His reluctance to answer my questions made me suspicious .
sentences.chinese: 他不愿回答我的问题，这引起我的怀疑。

sentences.english: She gave him a suspicious glance.
sentences.chinese: 她向他投去怀疑的一瞥。

sentences.english: You’ve got a very suspicious mind!
sentences.chinese: 你真是疑心太重！

detailed_translations.english: thinking that someone might be guilty of doing something wrong or dishonest

name: creation
trans: n. 创造，创作；创作物，产物

sentences.english: a job creation scheme
sentences.chinese: 创造就业机会的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 创造， 创建； 创造的作品， 产物； 宇宙， 天地万物
detailed_translations.english: the act of creating something

name: ingredient
trans: n. 原料；要素；组成部分 adj. 构成组成部分的

sentences.english: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

name: mixture
trans: n. 混合；混合物；混合剂

sentences.english: The town is a mixture of the old and the new.
sentences.chinese: 这个小城新旧结合。

detailed_translations.english: a combination of two or more different things, feelings, or types of people

name: remember
trans: vt. 记得；牢记；纪念；代…问好 vi. 记得，记起

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

name: topping
trans: v. 超过；高过；居……之首；把（某物）放在……的上面；优于；（非正式）自杀；到达山顶；出场；完成（着装）；去除……的顶部以供烹调；（高尔夫）误击（球上部）；在……上面形成顶部（top 的现在分词） n. （菜肴、蛋糕等上的）浇头，配料；被去掉顶部的东西 adj. （非正式）极好的；最高级的；傲慢的 n. (Topping) （美、英、爱）托平（人名）

name: vanilla
trans: n. 香子兰，香草 adj. 香草味的

sentences.english: I added a dollop of vanilla ice cream to the pie.
sentences.chinese: 我在馅饼中加了一块香草冰淇淋。

detailed_translations.english: a substance used to give a special taste to ice cream, cakes etc, made from the beans of a tropical plant
having the taste of vanilla

name: height
trans: n. 高地；高度；身高；顶点

sentences.english: Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆现在身高和他姐姐差不多了。

sentences.english: State your age, height, and weight.
sentences.chinese: 说出你的年龄、身高和体重。

sentences.english: Rachel had always been scared of heights.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔过去一直恐高。

detailed_translations.english: how tall someone or something is

name: measure
trans: n. 测量；措施；程度；尺寸 vt. 测量；估量；权衡 vi. 测量；估量

sentences.english: New safety measures were being demanded after last night’s horrific train crash.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生严重的火车相撞事故后，民众要求制定新的安全措施。

sentences.english: The new bridge was erected as a temporary measure to replace the one which was destroyed by floods.
sentences.chinese: 建这座新桥是为了临时代替被洪水毁坏的那座桥。

detailed_translations.english: an action, especially an official one, that is intended to deal with a particular problem

name: metric
trans: adj. 公制的；米制的；公尺的 n. 度量标准

sentences.english: a metric tonne
sentences.chinese: 一公吨

sentences.english: The parts all come in metric sizes now.
sentences.chinese: 现在配件都采用公制规格。

detailed_translations.english: using or connected with the  metric system  of weights and measures

name: system
trans: n. 制度，体制；系统；方法

sentences.english: an alarm system
sentences.chinese: 警报系统

sentences.english: a well-designed heating system
sentences.chinese: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.english: the digestive system
sentences.chinese: 消化系统

sentences.english: the railway system
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体
detailed_translations.english: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose

name: weigh
trans: vt. 权衡；考虑；称…重量 vi. 重量为…；具有重要性；成为…的重荷；起锚 n. 权衡；称重量

sentences.english: The young birds weigh only a few grams.
sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.english: Do you know how much it weighs?
sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

name: chip
trans: n. 炸薯条（片）；芯片，晶片；碎片，碎屑；缺口；筹码；（足球的）挑球，（高尔夫球）短切球 v. 打缺，弄缺；铲，凿，削；短切（球），踢（高球）；把（土豆等）切成小片（条）

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers

name: entrance
trans: n. 入口；进入 vt. 使出神，使入迷

sentences.english: the station entrance
sentences.chinese: 车站的入口处

sentences.english: Bridget made a dramatic entrance into the room.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特动作夸张地进了房间。

detailed_translations.english: a door, gate etc that you go through to enter a place

name: igloo
trans: n. 圆顶建筑；雪块砌成的圆顶小屋；冰屋；爱斯基摩人圆顶小屋

sentences.english: Defining the town center of Râmnicu Vâlcea is a towering shopping mall that looks like a giant glass igloo.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔恰市中心的地标性建筑是一座高耸的购物商场，它看上去就像是一座巨型的玻璃圆顶建筑。

sentences.english: When you sign up, you adopt an animated penguin to chat to friends, play games, explore, collect coins and even personalise your very own igloo.
sentences.chinese: 当你注册后，你就会领养一直动画企鹅，与朋友聊天，玩游戏，探索，收集硬币，甚至个性化你自己的圆顶冰屋。

sentences.english: The next morning he and Egarter Vigl spruced up the body with a fine spray of sterilized water, which froze on contact. Then they slid the Iceman back into his high-tech igloo and closed the door.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，他和维格用一种很好的喷雾消毒水通过其冰冻接触清洁了冰人，之后将他滑进他的高科技圆顶建筑，关上门。

detailed_translations.english: Igloos are dome-shaped houses built from blocks of snow by the Inuit people

name: kettle
trans: n. 壶；[化工] 釜；罐；鼓 n. (Kettle)人名；(英)凯特尔

sentences.english: She filled the kettle and switched it on.
sentences.chinese: 她把水壶灌满，打开了开关。

sentences.english: The kettle’s boiling (= the water in it is boiling ).
sentences.chinese: 水壶里的水开了。

sentences.english: (= start boiling water in a kettle ), will you?
sentences.chinese: 烧壶水，好吗？

sentences.english: Put the meat into a small kettle.
sentences.chinese: 把肉放进一个小锅里。

detailed_translations.english: a container with a lid, a handle, and a spout,used for boiling and pouring water

trans: adj. 似烤面包片的；暖和舒适的；祝酒的

sentences.chinese: 铁路隧道

sentences.english: the Channel Tunnel (= between England and France )
sentences.chinese: 〔英吉利〕海峡隧道

detailed_translations.english: a passage that has been dug under the ground for cars, trains etc to go through

sentences.english: Do you fancy going out for a Chinese?
sentences.chinese: 你想不想出去吃顿中餐？

detailed_translations.english: relating to China, its people, or its language
people from China

name: firecracker
trans: n. 鞭炮，爆竹

sentences.english: I played firecracker but I hurt my finger with the fire.
sentences.chinese: 在我玩爆竹的时候，伤着了我的手指。

sentences.english: As we came in the second time, Kasokola was ready, and we put the first firecracker straight into the campfire.
sentences.chinese: 我们再次飞回来时，卡索科拉已经准备好了。 我们第一发爆竹炸弹径直射进了篝火中。

sentences.english: Red firecracker chaff left behind after store-opening celebrations attests to the optimism of many investors.
sentences.chinese: 市场开张庆典后的爆竹残渣,足以印证多数投资者的乐观情绪.

detailed_translations.english: a small  firework  that explodes loudly

name: firefighter
trans: n. 消防队员

sentences.english: When every molecule in your body tells you to run away from the burning building, as a firefighter you have to resist the urge, override it and plunge in.
sentences.chinese: 当你身体内每个细胞都告诉逃离失火的建筑物时，作为一名消防员，你必须克制这种冲动，超越它，投入火场进行战斗。

sentences.english: He mows lawns and gardens for half a dozen clients in Grafton, some of them family friends. And he is an active volunteer firefighter.
sentences.chinese: 他为格拉夫顿六户人家修剪草坪和花园，他们中一些是父母的朋友，此外他还是个积极的义务消防员。

sentences.english: Locally and from the state standpoint, we had some firefighter jobs that were in jeopardy, up in the hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 站在州政府的立场，我们有一些消防员在危险岗位工作，最多时有数百人。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to stop fires burning

name: firework

sentences.english: a New Year’s Eve fireworks display
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜的烟火表演

sentences.english: Jeff and David were in the back yard setting off fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫和戴维在后院放烟花。

trans: n. 喷泉，泉水；源泉 n. (Fountain)人名；(英)方丹

sentences.english: The fountain wells its cold water.
sentences.chinese: 喷泉涌出清凉的泉水。

sentences.english: He was a fountain of information on Asian affairs.
sentences.chinese: 他是亚洲事务的信息源。

trans: n. 茧；卵囊 vt. 把……紧紧包住

sentences.english: ...like a butterfly emerging from a cocoon.
sentences.chinese: …好似蝴蝶破茧而出。

detailed_translations.english: a silk cover that young  moths  and other insects make to protect themselves while they are growing

name: larva
trans: n. [水产] 幼体，[昆] 幼虫 n. (Larva)人名；(芬、捷)拉尔瓦

sentences.english: The eggs quickly hatch into larvae.
sentences.chinese: 这些卵很快孵化成幼虫。

detailed_translations.english: a young insect with a soft tube-shaped body, which will later become an insect with wings

name: metamorphosis
trans: n. 变形；变质

name: nymph
trans: n. 女神；居于山林水泽的仙女；美丽的少女；蛹

detailed_translations.chinese: 女神；居于山林水泽的仙女；美丽的少女；蛹
detailed_translations.english: one of the spirits of nature who, according to ancient Greek and Roman stories, appeared as young girls living in trees, mountains, streams etc

name: pupa
trans: n. [昆] 蛹 n. (Pupa)人名；(意)普帕

name: continent
trans: n. 大陆，洲，陆地 adj. 自制的，克制的

sentences.english: the continents of Asia and Africa
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及非洲大陆

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of land surrounded by sea
able to control your sexual desires

name: equator
trans: n. 赤道

sentences.english: The United States is north of the equator.
sentences.chinese: 美国位于赤道以北。

sentences.english: In the hot zone near the equator the sun heats the air continually; hence the air there ascends.
sentences.chinese: 在靠近赤道的热带地区，太阳不断地加热那里的空气，于是那里的热空气就上升。

detailed_translations.english: an imaginary line drawn around the middle of the Earth that is exactly the same distance from the North Pole and the South Pole

name: latitude
trans: n. 纬度；界限；活动范围

sentences.english: The birds breed in northern latitudes.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在北纬地区繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: The latitude of a place is its distance from the equator.

name: longitude
trans: n. [地理] 经度；经线

sentences.english: The town lies at longitude 12˚ east.
sentences.chinese: 这个镇位于东经12度。

detailed_translations.english: the distance east or west of a particular  meridian (= imaginary line along the Earth’s surface from the North Pole to the South Pole )  , measured in degrees

name: North Pole
trans: n. 北极

name: church
trans: n. 教堂；礼拜；教派 adj. 教会的；礼拜的 vt. 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式 n. (Church)人名；(英)丘奇

sentences.english: a short church service
sentences.chinese: 简短的教堂礼拜仪式

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a building where Christians go to worship

detailed_translations.chinese: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

name: mosque
trans: n. 清真寺

sentences.english: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.chinese: 你会去教堂，犹太教会，或者清真寺吗？

sentences.english: If there is to be a new city church, they argue, then why not a mosque?
sentences.chinese: 他们置疑说，如果要修建一个新的城市教堂为什么不能是座清真寺呢？

sentences.english: Tell the congregation of a church or mosque that existence is too vulgar an attribute to fasten onto their God, and they will brand you an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 告诉教堂或清真寺的会众们，存在，是强加在他们的上帝身上的一种过于庸俗的属性，他们将会指责你为无神论者。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which Muslims worship

name: port
trans: n. 港口，口岸；（计算机的）端口；左舷；舱门 vi. 转向左舷 vt. 持（枪）；左转舵 n. (Port)人名；(英)波特；(法)波尔；(德、俄、匈、捷)波尔特

sentences.english: Britain’s largest port
sentences.chinese: 英国最大的港口城市

detailed_translations.chinese: 港口，口岸；（计算机的）端口；左舷；舱门
detailed_translations.english: a place where ships can be loaded and unloaded
to turn or be turned towards the port

name: Africa
trans: n. 非洲

sentences.english: The giraffe ranges in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 长颈鹿生长在非洲。

sentences.english: The practice still prevails in some parts of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种做法在非洲某些地区仍然很盛行。

sentences.english: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 他只身长途跋涉， 从东向西横穿整个非洲大陆。

name: behave
trans: vi. 表现；（机器等）运转；举止端正；（事物）起某种作用 vt. 使守规矩；使表现得…

sentences.english: She behaved in a very responsible way .
sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应
detailed_translations.english: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc
The way that you behave is the way that you do and say things, and the things that you do and say

name: chimpanzee
trans: n. [脊椎] 黑猩猩

sentences.english: So when you go from head to toe, you're seeing a mosaic creature that is neither chimpanzee, nor is it human.
sentences.chinese: 所以从头到脚，让人看到的是一个在黑猩猩和人类之间模棱两可的生物，这就是始祖地人猿。

sentences.english: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.english: It was, if I can give a chimpanzee language, I can empty the contents of his mind. He can tell me what he's thinking, how he sees the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的想法是，如果我能交给黑猩猩一种语言的话，我就可以掏空他的想法，他可以告诉我他在想什么，他是怎样看这个世界的。

detailed_translations.english: an intelligent African animal that is like a large monkey without a tail

name: scientist
trans: n. 科学家

sentences.english: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.english: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.english: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.

trans: n. 节日；庆祝，纪念活动；欢乐 adj. 节日的，喜庆的；快乐的

sentences.chinese: 斯旺西音乐艺术节

sentences.chinese: 我们用手电筒照着山洞。

trans: n. 惯例，传统；传说

sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

trans: v. 打鼾 n. 打鼾（声）；（非正式）极度令人厌烦的东西

trans: n. 帐篷；住处；帷幕 vt. 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿 vi. 住帐蓬；暂时居住 n. (Tent)人名；(罗、瑞典)滕特

to speak or say something very quietly, using your breath rather than your voice

trans: n. [物] 能量；精力；活力；精神

sentences.chinese: 小船出现了漏洞。

sentences.chinese: 在林间呼啸的风

sentences.chinese: 炸弹袭击

sentences.chinese: 纵火袭击

sentences.chinese: 仙人掌的刺

name: president

sentences.english: the president of General Motors
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

name: attraction

sentences.chinese: 我告诉平面广告的工作团队，从制作一个广告牌开始。

sentences.chinese: 停止做公司的广告牌，向我们展示 你自己 。

sentences.english: He erected a monument on the spot where his daughter was killed.
sentences.chinese: 他在女儿遇难的地方立了块纪念碑。

sentences.chinese: 我们依偎在一起看睡前故事。

sentences.chinese: 这部影片是根据真实故事改编的。

sentences.chinese: 秋天的雾霭

sentences.chinese: 把糖、鸡蛋和面粉掺在一起。

sentences.chinese: 混合茶叶

sentences.english: snow-capped mountain peaks
sentences.chinese: 白雪覆盖的山顶

sentences.english: jagged peaks
sentences.chinese: 嶙峋的山峰

sentences.english: It was a time of peak demand for the product.
sentences.chinese: 那是对该产品需求最旺的时期。

detailed_translations.english: the sharply pointed top of a mountain
used to talk about the best, highest, or greatest level or amount of something

name: range
trans: n. 范围；幅度；排；山脉 vi. （在...内）变动；平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到 vt. 漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

name: bishop
trans: n. （基督教的）主教；（国际象棋的）象

sentences.english: the Bishop of Durham
sentences.chinese: 达勒姆郡的主教

detailed_translations.english: a priest with a high rank in some Christian religions, who is the head of all the churches and priests in a large area

name: Catholic
trans: adj. 天主教的；宽宏大量的 n. 天主教徒；罗马天主教

sentences.english: ...the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: …天主教会。

detailed_translations.english: connected with the Roman Catholic Church
a member of the Catholic Church

name: custom
trans: n. 习惯，惯例；风俗；海关，关税；经常光顾；[总称]（经常性的）顾客 adj. （衣服等）定做的，定制的

sentences.english: She was stopped at customs and questioned.
sentences.chinese: 她在海关被叫住接受问话。

sentences.english: It took ages to clear customs (= be allowed through customs ) but then we were out of the airport quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 过海关花了很长时间，不过出机场倒是很快。

sentences.english: You won’t be able to take that through customs.
sentences.chinese: 你带着那东西过不了海关的。

detailed_translations.english: the place where your bags are checked for illegal goods when you go into a country

name: Ireland
trans: n. 爱尔兰

sentences.english: We surmised you had gone to Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 我们还以为你去爱尔兰了呢，原来你并没去呀。

sentences.english: Etymology: over England; from one land to another; into Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 词源学：越过英格兰，从一个陆地到另一个陆地，爱尔兰。

sentences.english: Ireland, Portugal and Greece have all required rescues.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰，葡萄牙和希腊都需要救助。

name: kimono
trans: n. 和服

name: postcard
trans: n. 明信片

sentences.english: Don’t forget to send us a postcard!
sentences.chinese: 别忘了给我们寄张明信片！

detailed_translations.english: a card that can be sent in the post without an envelope, especially one with a picture on it

name: sole
trans: adj. 唯一的；（个人、集体）专有的；（尤指女性）未婚的；单独的 n. 脚底；鞋底（不包括后跟）；脚趾和脚弓之间的部分；（刨子等工具的）底部；（船舱或驾驶室的）地面；鳎（可食用比目鱼） v. 给（鞋）换底 n. (Sole) （西）索莱（人名）

sentences.english: the sole American in the room
sentences.chinese: 房间里唯一的美国人

sentences.english: Griffiths is the sole survivor of the crash.
sentences.chinese: 格里菲思是此次撞车事故唯一的幸存者。

sentences.english: The soles of his feet were caked in mud.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚掌上沾满了泥巴。

sentences.english: the soles of her shoes
sentences.chinese: 她鞋子的鞋底

detailed_translations.english: the sole person, thing etc is the only one
the bottom surface of your foot, especially the part you walk or stand on

name: stirrup
trans: n. [建] 箍筋；马镫；镫形物 n. (Stirrup)人名；(英)斯特拉普

detailed_translations.english: one of the rings of metal in which someone riding a horse rests their feet

name: deaf
trans: adj. 聋的

sentences.english: communication between deaf and hearing people
sentences.chinese: 失聪者和听力正常者之间的交流

sentences.english: I think Mum’s going a bit deaf .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得妈妈有点耳聋了。

sentences.english: She’s deaf and dumb (= unable to hear or speak ) and communicates using sign language.
sentences.chinese: 她又聋又哑，用手语交流。

sentences.english: She was deaf to his pleas.
sentences.chinese: 她对他的恳求充耳不闻。

detailed_translations.english: physically unable to hear anything or unable to hear well

name: inspiration
trans: n. 灵感；鼓舞；吸气；妙计

sentences.english: The Malvern Hills have provided inspiration for many artists and musicians over the decades.
sentences.chinese: 几十年来，莫尔文丘陵为很多艺术家和音乐家提供了灵感。

sentences.english: He raised his eyes to the altar as if seeking inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他抬头看看祭坛，似乎在寻求灵感。

sentences.english: He draws inspiration from ordinary scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他从日常生活中得到灵感。

sentences.english: Mary Quant’s inspiration comes from the glam style of the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉·官的灵感来自70年代的魅惑风格。

sentences.english: He had a sudden flash of inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他突然灵感闪现。

sentences.english: He has always been a source of inspiration for me.
sentences.chinese: 他一直是我灵感的源泉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灵感； 鼓舞人心的人
detailed_translations.english: a good idea about what you should do, write, say etc, especially one which you get suddenly

name: sense
trans: n. 感觉，功能；观念；道理；理智 vt. 感觉到；检测 n. (Sense) （美）森斯（人名）

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

name: signing
trans: n. 签署；签字 v. 签字；写下；示意（sign的ing形式）

name: awful
trans: adj. 可怕的；极坏的；使人敬畏的

sentences.english: The weather was awful.
sentences.chinese: 天气很糟糕。

detailed_translations.english: very bad or unpleasant

name: content
trans: n. 内容，目录；满足；容量 adj. 满意的 vt. 使满足 n. (Content)人名；(法)孔唐

sentences.english: The content of the media course includes scripting, editing and camera work.
sentences.chinese: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

detailed_translations.english: the ideas, facts, or opinions that are contained in a speech, piece of writing, film, programme etc

name: habit
trans: n. 习惯，习性；嗜好 vt. 使穿衣

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

name: manure
trans: n. 肥料，粪肥 v. 给……施肥

sentences.english: ...bags of manure.
sentences.chinese: …一袋袋的肥料。

detailed_translations.english: waste matter from animals that is mixed with soil to improve the soil and help plants grow

name: odor
trans: n. 气味；名声 n. (Odor)人名；(匈)欧多尔

sentences.english: I smelled the odor of money.
sentences.chinese: 我闻到了一股铜臭气。

sentences.english: The researchers demonstrate that it is possible to generate odor in a compact device that can fit on the back of a TV with potentially thousands of odors.
sentences.chinese: 研究员表示，将一个可以散发上千种气味的小型设备安装在电视背后，从而实现电视(根据情景)生成气味是可能的。

sentences.english: Pewter has an odor.
sentences.chinese: 锡器有一股臭气。

name: refreshed
trans: v. 使清凉；使重新提起精神；得到补充给养；更新（refresh 的过去式和过去分词） adj. 清爽的，恢复精神的

name: apology
trans: n. 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物

sentences.english: Edward can’t be here today, but he sends his apologies .
sentences.chinese: 爱德华今天来不了，他向大家表示歉意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write to show that you are sorry for doing something wrong

name: compete
trans: vi. 竞争；比赛；对抗

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

name: fail
trans: vi. 失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退 vt. 不及格；使失望；忘记；舍弃 n. 不及格 n. (Fail)人名；(葡、捷)法伊尔；(法)法伊

sentences.english: It looks likely that the peace talks will fail.
sentences.chinese: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.english: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).
sentences.chinese: 数百万人戒过烟，都以惨败告终。

sentences.english: his efforts to save his failing marriage
sentences.chinese: 他挽救自己濒危婚姻的努力

sentences.english: The brakes on my bike failed half way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我骑自行车下山到中途刹车失灵了。

detailed_translations.english: to not succeed in achieving something

name: glare
trans: v. 怒目而视，瞪眼看；发出刺眼的光 n. 怒视，瞪眼；刺眼；耀眼的光；受公众注目；张扬；俗艳 adj. 光滑的

sentences.english: The old woman glared at him.
sentences.chinese: 那个老妇人怒视着他。

sentences.english: The sun glared down on us.
sentences.chinese: 刺眼的阳光照在我们身上。

sentences.english: She gave him a hostile glare.
sentences.chinese: 她狠狠地瞪了他一眼。

sentences.english: a special screen to reduce glare
sentences.chinese: 一种可以减弱刺眼强光的特殊屏幕

detailed_translations.english: to look angrily at someone for a long time
a long angry look

name: smirk
trans: v. 得意地笑，幸灾乐祸地笑，傻笑；假笑；以假笑表示，以傻笑表示 n. 傻笑，得意的笑；假笑

sentences.english: The boys tried not to smirk.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们强忍住得意的笑。

detailed_translations.english: to smile in an unpleasant way that shows that you are pleased by someone else’s bad luck or think you are better than other people

name: peer
trans: n. 同等地位的人，同龄人；贵族 v. 凝视，盯着看；隐现；看见；匹配 n. (Peer) （美、爱、英）皮尔（人名）

sentences.english: American children did less well in math than their peers in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 美国儿童的数学成绩不如日本的同龄儿童。

sentences.english: Staff members are trained by their peers.
sentences.chinese: 员工由同事培训。

detailed_translations.english: your peers are the people who are the same age as you, or who have the same type of job, social class etc

name: proud
trans: adj. 自豪的；得意的；自负的；突出的 n. (Proud)人名；(英)普劳德

sentences.english: a proud man who would not admit his mistakes
sentences.chinese: 自以为是、不愿认错的男子

sentences.english: Seth was the proud owner of a new sports car.
sentences.chinese: 赛思因为有了新跑车而扬扬得意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骄傲的；自负的〔含贬义〕；自豪的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are more important, skilful etc than you really are – used to show disapproval

name: recess
trans: n. 休息；休会；凹处 vt. 使凹进；把…放在隐蔽处 vi. 休息；休假

sentences.english: the deep recesses of the cave
sentences.chinese: 洞穴的幽深处

detailed_translations.english: a space in the wall of a room, especially for shelves, cupboards etc

name: recognize
trans: vt. 认出，识别；承认；接受，认可；赞赏 vi. 确认，承认；具结

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

name: stand up
trans: v. 站起来；坚持；竖立；站得住脚；拥护

sentences.english: He made wild accusations that did not stand up.
sentences.chinese: 他作出了经不起检验的无端的指控。

detailed_translations.english: If something such as a claim or a piece of evidence stands up, it is accepted as true or satisfactory after being carefully examined

name: agreement
trans: n. 协议；同意，一致

sentences.english: They had made an agreement that they would share the profits equally.
sentences.chinese: 他们达成协议，平分利润。

sentences.english: Would their discussion result in his agreement to visit his stepmother?
sentences.chinese: 他们商量后，他会不会同意去看望继母？

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement or promise to do something, made by two or more people, companies, organizations etc

name: colony
trans: n. 殖民地；移民队；种群；动物栖息地

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

name: course
trans: n. 科目；课程；过程；进程；道路；路线，航向；一道菜 vt. 追赶；跑过 vi. 指引航线；快跑

sentences.english: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.chinese: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.english: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.english: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主菜是鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a series of lessons in a particular subject

name: feast
trans: n. 筵席，宴会；（感官）享受；节日 v. 尽情享用，饱餐；宴请；赴宴

sentences.english: They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尽情地吃， 宴饮； 参加宴会
detailed_translations.english: If you feast on a particular food, you eat a large amount of it with great enjoyment
a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion

name: Pilgrim
trans: n. 朝圣者；漫游者；（美）最初的移民 vi. 去朝圣；漫游 n. (Pilgrim)人名；(英、德)皮尔格林

name: creature
trans: n. 动物，生物；人；创造物

sentences.english: all the living creatures in the sea
sentences.chinese: 海洋中所有的生物

detailed_translations.english: anything that is living, such as an animal, fish, or insect, but not a plant

name: escape
trans: vt. 逃避，避开，避免；被忘掉；被忽视 vi. 逃脱；避开；溜走；（气体，液体等）漏出；（未受伤或只受了一点伤害而）逃脱；声音（不自觉地）由…发出 n. 逃跑；逃亡；逃走；逃跑工具或方法；野生种；泄漏

sentences.english: He broke down the locked door and escaped.
sentences.chinese: 他砸开上锁的门，逃走了。

sentences.english: Vents allow any steam to escape if the system overheats.
sentences.chinese: 如果系统过热，排放口可使蒸汽逸出。

sentences.english: The girl had no chance of escape.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩没有机会逃跑。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a place when someone is trying to catch you or stop you, or when there is a dangerous situation
the act of getting away from a place, or a dangerous or bad situation

name: glacier
trans: n. 冰河，冰川

sentences.english: The glacier calved a large iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 冰川崩解而产生一个大冰山。

sentences.english: The glacier dislocated great stones.
sentences.chinese: 冰川使许多大石块移位了。

sentences.english: A river or glacier debouches on the plains.
sentences.chinese: 一条河流或冰川流向平原。

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of ice which moves slowly down a mountain valley

name: lumber
trans: v. 笨重地行动，缓慢地移动；（非正式）拖累；伐木；乱堆；逢场作戏地结识（可能成为性伴侣）；迫使担负（职责等）；烦扰 n. 木材； 废旧家具，废物，无用的杂物；方材被看作可能成为性伴侣的人

sentences.english: A blue bus lumbered past.
sentences.chinese: 一辆蓝色公共汽车慢吞吞地驶过。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动
detailed_translations.english: to move in a slow awkward way

detailed_translations.chinese: 木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声
detailed_translations.english: pieces of wood used for building, that have been cut to specific lengths and widths

name: walnut
trans: n. 胡桃；胡桃木 adj. 胡桃科植物的

sentences.english: coffee and walnut cake
sentences.chinese: 咖啡核桃蛋糕

detailed_translations.english: a nut that you can eat, shaped like a human brain

name: bond
trans: n. 债券；结合；约定；粘合剂；纽带 vi. 结合，团结在一起 vt. 使结合；以…作保 n. (Bond)人名；(英、德、西、刚(金)、瑞典)邦德

sentences.english: My father put all his money into stock market bonds.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲把他所有的钱都投在上市债券上。

sentences.english: furious trading on the bond market
sentences.chinese: 债券市场疯狂的交易

sentences.english: the emotional bond between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的感情纽带

detailed_translations.english: an official document promising that a government or company will pay back money that it has borrowed, often with interest

name: characteristic
trans: adj. 典型的；特有的；表示特性的 n. 特征；特性；特色

sentences.english: the highly characteristic (= very typical ) flint walls of the local houses
sentences.chinese: 当地房子非常有特色的燧石墙

sentences.english: Violent images are a defining characteristic of his work.
sentences.chinese: 暴力形象是他作品的一个鲜明特征。

detailed_translations.english: very typical of a particular thing or of someone’s character
a quality or feature of something or someone that is typical of them and easy to recognize

name: personality
trans: n. 个性；品格；名人

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

name: twin
trans: n. 双胞胎中的一人；一对相似的事物之一 adj. 孪生的；双胞胎之一的；双生的；成双的；双重的 v. 使结成姐妹城市；使耦合；成对；生双胞胎 n. (Twin) 特温（人名）

sentences.english: I always confounded him with his twin brother.
sentences.chinese: 我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.english: The twin brothers were removed from our class.
sentences.chinese: 这一对孪生兄弟已从我们班转走。

sentences.english: The twin brothers bled for their country and died without any regrets.
sentences.chinese: 这对孪生兄弟为国流血牺牲， 死而无憾。

name: cornucopia
trans: n. 哺乳宙斯的羊角；装满花果及谷穗表丰饶的羊角状物；丰饶的象征

name: explorer
trans: n. 探险家；勘探者；探测器；[医]探针

sentences.english: ...the travels of Columbus, Magellan, and many other explorers.
sentences.chinese: …哥伦布、麦哲伦和许多其他探险家的旅行。

detailed_translations.english: someone who travels through an unknown area to find out about it

name: harvest
trans: n. 收获；产量；结果 vt. 收割；得到 vi. 收割庄稼

sentences.english: every year at harvest time
sentences.chinese: 每年在收获的季节

sentences.english: Plum growers are expecting a bumper harvest this year.
sentences.chinese: 种植李树的农民期盼着今年有个好收成。

detailed_translations.english: the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them
to gather crops from the fields

name: settler
trans: n. 移居者；殖民者 n. (Settler)人名；(德)泽特勒

sentences.english: early settlers in Australia
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚的早期移民

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes to live in a country or area where not many people like them have lived before, and that is a long way from any towns or cities

name: Arab
trans: adj. 阿拉伯的 n. 阿拉伯人；阿拉伯马

sentences.english: When you call me Arab, I say yes.
sentences.chinese: 当你叫我阿拉伯人的时候，我说是。

sentences.english: What of the last in the Arab 2011?
sentences.chinese: 在2011年的阿拉伯，后一种是什么呢？

sentences.english: France, he said, should not fear change in the Arab world; for the first time in history, democratic ideals “could triumph on all shores of the Mediterranean”.
sentences.chinese: 萨科奇说，法国不应惧怕阿拉伯世界的转变；在历史上第一次民主的思想“可以在地中海沿岸的所有国家取得胜利。”

detailed_translations.english: someone whose language is Arabic and whose family comes from, or originally came from, the Middle East or North Africa

name: gulf
trans: n. 海湾；深渊；分歧；漩涡 vt. 吞没

sentences.english: the Gulf of Mexico
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥湾

detailed_translations.english: a large area of sea partly enclosed by land

name: Islam
trans: n. 伊斯兰教 n. (Islam)人名；(阿拉伯、巴基、孟)伊斯兰

sentences.english: He converted to Islam at the age of 16.
sentences.chinese: 他在16岁时皈依了伊斯兰教。

detailed_translations.english: the Muslim religion, which was started by Muhammad and whose holy book is the Quran (Koran)

name: chocolate
trans: n. 巧克力，巧克力糖；巧克力色 adj. 巧克力色的；巧克力口味的 n. (Chocolate)人名；(葡)绍科拉特

sentences.english: a chocolate bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.english: a box of chocolates
sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

detailed_translations.english: a sweet brown food that you can eat as a sweet or use in cooking to give foods such as cakes a special sweet taste

name: Cupid
trans: n. 丘比特（罗马神话中的爱神）

name: pleased
trans: adj. 高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事 v. 满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: Your Dad will be so pleased.
sentences.chinese: 你爸爸会非常高兴的。

sentences.english: She seemed pleased by the compliment.
sentences.chinese: 她受了赞扬，显得很高兴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事
detailed_translations.english: happy or satisfied

detailed_translations.chinese: 满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）

name: valentine
trans: n. 情人；情人节礼物

sentences.english: Be my valentine.
sentences.chinese: 做我的情人吧。

detailed_translations.english: someone you love or think is attractive, that you send a card to on St Valentine’s Day

name: dentist
trans: n. 牙科医生 牙医诊所

sentences.english: Visit your dentist twice a year for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 每年看两次牙医做检查。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth

name: fangs
trans: n. [脊椎] 尖牙；[脊椎] 毒牙（fang的复数）；物体的尖端 v. 用尖牙咬；配以尖牙般的东西（fang的三单形式）

name: floss
trans: n. 牙线；丝棉；乱丝 vt. 用牙线洁牙 vi. 用牙线清洁 n. (Floss)人名；(英、德)弗洛斯

name: inspect
trans: vt. 检查；视察；检阅 vi. 进行检查；进行视察

sentences.english: I got out of the car to inspect the damage.
sentences.chinese: 我下车查看损坏情况。

sentences.english: Police inspected the scene and interviewed all the staff.
sentences.chinese: 警察仔细检查了现场并询问了所有员工。

sentences.english: General Allenby arrived to inspect the troops.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦比将军前来检阅部队。

detailed_translations.english: to examine something carefully in order to find out more about it or to find out what is wrong with it

name: terrify
trans: vt. 恐吓；使恐怖；使害怕

sentences.english: Her husband’s violence terrified her.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫的暴力行为让她感到害怕。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone extremely afraid

name: vampire
trans: n. 吸血鬼；[脊椎] 吸血蝙蝠

name: condensation
trans: n. 冷凝；凝结；压缩；缩合聚合

sentences.english: He used his sleeve to wipe the condensation off the glass.
sentences.chinese: 他用袖子擦去眼镜上凝结的水滴。

detailed_translations.english: when a gas becomes a liquid

name: evaporation
trans: n. 蒸发；消失

sentences.english: Water enters air via evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 水通过蒸发进入空气。

sentences.english: Because it is located in a very hot and dry region, the Dead Sea loses much water through evaporation, causing its level to fluctuate during the year.
sentences.chinese: 因为它处于一个非常炎热和干燥的地区，死海由于蒸发损失掉大量的水，导致其水平面一年到头不断波动。

sentences.english: There has not been much change in rainfall in those areas but the temperature has risen by over 1 degree Centigrade since 1970, which will have enhanced losses due to evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 那些地区的降雨量没有太大变化，但是自1970年以来上升的气温已经超过了1摄氏度，由于蒸发这将会造成水分的更大流失。

name: precipitation
trans: n. [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽
detailed_translations.english: rain, snow etc that falls on the ground, or the amount of rain, snow etc that falls

name: recycle
trans: v. 回收利用；使再循环；重新使用 n. 回收利用，循环使用

sentences.english: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.
sentences.chinese: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

detailed_translations.english: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new

name: dawn
trans: n. 黎明；开端 vt. 破晓；出现；被领悟 n. (Dawn)人名；(西)道恩

sentences.english: When dawn broke (= the first light of the day appeared ) , we were still 50 miles from Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 破晓的时候，我们离加尔各答还有50英里。

sentences.english: I was up at the crack of dawn (= very early in the morning ) to get the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我一大早就起来赶飞机。

sentences.english: We worked from dawn to dusk (= through the whole day while it is light ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们从早干到晚。

sentences.english: the cold light of dawn
sentences.chinese: 清冷的晨曦

sentences.english: The morning dawned fresh and clear after the storm.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨过后，破晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: the time at the beginning of the day when light first appears
if day or morning dawns, it begins

name: dusk
trans: n. 黄昏，薄暮；幽暗，昏暗 adj. 微暗的 vt. 使变微暗 vi. 变微暗

sentences.english: The street lights go on at dusk.
sentences.chinese: 街灯在黄昏时亮起来。

detailed_translations.english: the time before it gets dark when the sky is becoming less bright

name: knit
trans: vi. 编织；结合；皱眉 vt. 编织；结合 n. 编织衣物；编织法

sentences.english: My grandmother taught me how to knit.
sentences.chinese: 我祖母教过我编织。

sentences.english: She’s knitting a sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她在织毛衣。

detailed_translations.english: to make clothing out of wool, using two knitting needles

name: nettle
trans: n. 荨麻，荨麻科 v. 惹怒，使恼火；用荨麻刺伤或鞭打（某人）

sentences.english: The nettles stung their legs.
sentences.chinese: 荨麻刺痛了他们的腿。

detailed_translations.english: a wild plant with rough leaves that sting you

name: task
trans: n. （困难的）任务，工作；（语言教学中的）活动 v. 派给某人（任务）；对（手段或能力）要求极高

sentences.english: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.english: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.english: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.english: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .
sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

name: actor
trans: n. 男演员；行动者；作用物

sentences.english: His father was an actor in the Cantonese Opera Company.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲曾是粤剧团的一名演员。

detailed_translations.english: someone who performs in a play or film

name: comedy
trans: n. 喜剧；喜剧性；有趣的事情

sentences.english: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

name: history
trans: n. 历史，历史学；历史记录；来历

sentences.english: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.english: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.chinese: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.english: the early history of Scotland
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰的早期历史

sentences.english: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.chinese: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.english: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.chinese: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.english: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.english: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.chinese: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.english: a decision that changed the course of history
sentences.chinese: 改变历史进程的决定

sentences.english: a college steeped in history
sentences.chinese: 一所历史悠久的学院

sentences.english: Your doctor will ask for your medical history.
sentences.chinese: 医生会询问你的病历。

detailed_translations.english: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation

name: playwright
trans: n. 剧作家

sentences.english: The playwright does something remarkable in this scene, but without any impression of straining after an effect.
sentences.chinese: 剧作家在这场中有许多惊人妙笔，但并不给人留下竭力追求表面效果的印象。

sentences.english: His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
sentences.chinese: 他的剧本被翻译成所有主要使用着的语言，并且表演次数远远超过其他任何剧作家。

sentences.english: His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
sentences.chinese: 他的剧本被翻译成世界上多种主要语言，并且表演次数远远超过其他任何剧作家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes plays

name: popular
trans: adj. 流行的，通俗的；受欢迎的；大众的；普及的

sentences.english: Hilary was popular at school.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在学校里很受欢迎。

sentences.english: a popular holiday resort
sentences.chinese: 人们喜欢的度假胜地

sentences.english: Coffee is probably the most popular drink in the world.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡很可能是世界上最受欢迎的饮料。

sentences.english: a popular movement for democracy
sentences.chinese: 争取民主的全民运动

detailed_translations.english: liked by a lot of people

name: tragedy
trans: n. 悲剧；灾难；惨案

sentences.english: The tragedy happened as they were returning home from a night out.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧发生在他们夜里外出归来的路上。

sentences.english: Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧降临到这个家庭，他们两岁的儿子在一次事故中丧生。

detailed_translations.english: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death

name: adventure
trans: n. 冒险；冒险精神；投机活动 vt. 冒险；大胆说出 vi. 冒险

sentences.english: a great adventure
sentences.chinese: 一大奇遇

sentences.english: Ahab’s adventures at sea
sentences.chinese: 亚哈的海上历险

sentences.english: an adventure story
sentences.chinese: 一个历险故事

detailed_translations.english: an exciting experience in which dangerous or unusual things happen

name: bundle
trans: n. 束；捆 vt. 捆 vi. 匆忙离开

sentences.english: a small bundle containing mostly clothing
sentences.chinese: 一个小包袱，里面主要是衣服

sentences.english: He was bundled into a car and driven 50 miles to a police station.
sentences.chinese: 他被塞进一辆小汽车，被带到50英里外的警察局。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things such as papers, clothes, or sticks that are fastened or tied together

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集， 归拢； 把…塞入
detailed_translations.english: If someone is bundled somewhere, someone pushes them there in a rough and hurried way

name: galoshes
trans: n. 胶套鞋

name: snowshoeing
trans: n. 穿雪鞋行走 v. 穿雪鞋行走（snowshoe 的现在分词）

name: suggest
trans: vt. 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示

sentences.english: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.english: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

name: wrinkle
trans: n. 皱纹 vi. 起皱 vt. 使起皱纹

sentences.english: Her face was a mass of wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸上布满皱纹。

sentences.english: Alex wrinkled up her nose at the smell.
sentences.chinese: 闻到那股味道，亚历克丝皱起了鼻子。

detailed_translations.english: wrinkles are lines on your face and skin that you get when you are old
if you wrinkle a part of your face, or if it wrinkles, small lines appear on it

name: canopy
trans: n. 天篷；华盖；遮篷；苍穹 vt. 用天蓬遮盖；遮盖

sentences.english: the forest canopy
sentences.chinese: 森林的树冠层

detailed_translations.english: a cover made of cloth that is fixed above a bed, seat etc as a decoration or as a shelter

name: coniferous
trans: adj. 结球果的；松柏科的

name: deciduous
trans: adj. 落叶性的，脱落性的；非永久性的

sentences.english: Deciduous antlers; deciduous leaves; deciduous teeth .
sentences.chinese: 脱落的鹿角；落叶；脱落的牙齿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非永久的； 短暂的； 脱落的； 落叶的
detailed_translations.english: deciduous trees lose their leaves in winter

name: dreidel
trans: n. 陀螺；四面陀螺

name: Holi
trans: n. 胡里节（印度节日）

name: Ramadan
trans: n. 斋月（伊斯兰教历的九月，等于Ramazan）
